segments.text: Mr.Sellers ? It's Steven speaking , your tenant . We've just suffered a power failure.What should I do now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , Steven . Do you have a flashlight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , now go down to the basement and find the circuit box . Open it and check if there are any fuses blown out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do I know if it's blown out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll see it's black and has burnt smell .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Unscrew the burnt fuses and replace them with the good ones . You can find them on the rack in the basement .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I'll try . I'll call you again if that doesn't work .
segments.speaker: S1
